document.full_text: comcast corp and cbs corp showed the tv business is even stronger than billed, reporting earnings that surpassed most forecasts and setting the stage for healthy price increases in the next round of ad sales.
document.title: strong ad market drives comcast and cbs results
lines_and_colors: comcast corp and cbs corp showed the tv business is even stronger than billed, reporting earnings that surpassed most forecasts and setting the stage for healthy price increases in the next round of ad sales.
